about.title: More About Me
about.name: Ionut Luca
about.aboutme1: Ever since I started coding, I have been fascinated by the power of technology to solve real-world problems and create meaningful digital experiences.
about.aboutme3: the .NET Developer program, and have since deepened my expertise through hands-on experience and industry certifications. My journey into software development has been driven by curiosity, a love for learning, and a strong desire to build scalable, efficient applications.
about.aboutme4: I thrive in collaborative, Agile environments where I can apply my problem-solving skills while continuously growing as a developer. Whether it is about designing a robust backend, creating seamless user interfaces, or integrating diverse components into a cohesive system, I take pride in writing clean, maintainable code that adds real value.
about.aboutme5: I am always on the lookout for exciting opportunities where I can apply my skills, tackle new challenges, and grow within a dynamic team.
about.aboutme6: Don't forget to check out my
about.aboutme7: if I have caught your interest!

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer
achievements: Developed a user-generated comment management system, improving data organization and visibility.
responsibilities: Implemented dynamic content display and storage logic in a .NET-based application.
Enhanced data retrieval efficiency using C#/.NET for backend and JavaScript for frontend.

jobs.title: .NET Backend Developer
achievements: Designed an image upload and validation system handling large CSV imports, ensuring 99% data accuracy.
Developed a C# console app that automated CSV data processing, reducing manual workload by 80%.
responsibilities: Created Swagger API endpoints for image uploads and validation.
Integrated Azure Blob Storage for scalable image storage.
Built backend functionality using C#/.NET, Docker, and Azure to improve platform performance.

jobs.title: IT Support Technician, Machine Operator & Warehouse Employee
achievements: Gained technical troubleshooting and customer support experience as an IT Support Technician.
Worked as a heavy machine operator, developing problem-solving skills and attention to detail in high-precision tasks.
Gained hands-on experience in logistics and teamwork as a warehouse employee, ensuring efficient inventory handling and order fulfillment.

education.title: Education
education.name: .NET Developer
education.description1: Focused on development of software, applications or web applications using  C#, .NET, JavaScript, SQL, and MongoDB.
education.description2: Hands-on experience in full-stack development & Agile (Scrum).

project.name: Gread Reads DataBase
project.sub_title: Full Stack Book Review Web Platform
project.tech: Tech Stack: C#, .NET (Blazor and REST API), React, SQL, Docker containers.
project.description1: Built a full-stack web application with a RESTful API and two user-friendly UIs: one for administrators (built with Blazor) for content and database management, and one for client interaction (built with React/JavaScript).
project.description2: The app enables administrators to perform CRUD operations for managing database content. Clients can add, modify, and delete books and book reviews upon successful registration/login.

project.name: Little Lemon Restaurant
project.tech: Tech Stack: Python, Django, MySql, HTML/CSS
project.description1: Developed a web app with reservations management,menu updates and order.
project.description2: Employees can manage bookings, update restaurant menu and clients can reserve tables or order menu items.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: I appreciate your time and interest in my work.If you have any questions, opportunities, tips, or just want to connect, feel free to reach out. You can do this by using the links here under or you can send me a direct message!
contact.second_intro: Looking forward to hearing from you!
contact.success_msg2: I will get back to you shortly.
contact.outro: Thank you for exploring my website!
